item.title: Sync my QT wallet
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

Hi,

Can you please let us know what version of the QT you are running?

There are some instructions for resyncing the QT wallet within this post:

How to Resync/update bitbay wallets without losing your wallet and FUNDS Get Started Guides
This was originally written for the hard fork on on 30th November 2017 that required everyone to update their client but the instructions should work for any wallet update/new fork. If you have not started the client lately or if you have but did not update it to latest version you might not see correct balance or even get 0 Balance on your client The following procedure will usually remedy the hard fork problem and many more problems with non correctly reported FUNDS inside your wallet. To â€¦

Let us know if that works.

Read full topic
